backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user access control, profiles, goals, planning data structures, and CRUD-style methods for goals and reviews.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI refactor features with related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level summaries for many frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, goal library modal flow, theming, and dashboard routing.
frontend/src/components/AutoPlanner/Auto: UI component letting users enter or select a template goal and duration to generate an auto‑planned goal using generatePlan.
Provides a review and editing interface for an auto‑generated plan and handles saving goals, milestones, and tasks to the backend.
Manages the Auto Planner flow between goal input and plan review, rendering the appropriate step.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckIn.tsx: Displays daily tasks, tracks completion or missed reasons, and submits a daily check‑in for a goal.
frontend/src/components/DashboardHome.ts: Renders the main dashboard hero, navigation sections, and locked‑in goals overview.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing credits, external link, and app version.
frontend/src/components/GoalDefinitionFl: Guides users through defining a new goal with description, timeframe, and motivation before saving.
frontend/src/components/GoalDetail.tsx: Shows detailed goal info with tabs for planning, tasks, reviews, and includes deletion functionality.
frontend/src/components/GoalLibraryModal: Displays a modal with categorized goal templates, lets users select templates, and creates goals from them.
frontend/src/components/GoalsOverview.ts: Shows a list of user goals with creation options and navigation to goal details or the goal library.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, accent color selector, profile menu, and navigation logic.
frontend/src/components/lockedIn/CheckIn: Shows a 7‑day visual check‑in streak with completion indicators and exposes overall check‑in stats.
frontend/src/components/lockedIn/LockedI: Lists all locked‑in goals with check‑in controls and links to create new plans when none exist.
frontend/src/components/PlanningPhase.ts: Guides users through adding milestones and tasks for a goal and allows locking in the completed plan.
frontend/src/components/profile/emojiOpt: Exports a preset list of emoji options for profile customization.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating or editing a user profile with name and emoji avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/SettingsPanel.ts: Settings panel for updating profile info, managing account actions, and copying principal ID.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyPlan/Weekl: Displays the user's locked-in weekly goals, showing placeholders if none exist and allowing navigation to the Auto Planner.
Renders an expandable card for a specific goal showing milestones, tasks, and progress metrics.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyReview.tsx: Provides a weekly review form where users mark completed tasks, write a summary, and submit a review.
frontend/src/contexts/DashboardNavigatio: Provides context for tracking and updating the active dashboard section.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccentPreset.ts: Manages accent color presets, syncing them to localStorage and updating CSS variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, goals, and related goal data through an actor interface. Handles caching, invalidation, errors, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for theming, including light/dark modes, semantic colors, and utility classes. Includes shared background utilities.
frontend/src/lib/autoPlanner/generatePla: Generates a structured goal plan with calculated milestones, weekly tasks, and daily tasks based on timeframe and optional custom duration. Provides default duration logic per timeframe.
frontend/src/lib/goalTemplates.ts: Defines predefined goal templates across categories with milestones, tasks, motivations, and default timeframes. Used to quickly create structured goal setups.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, adding QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App. Imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with navigation, sidebar, and section switching for goals, tasks, analytics, and auto-planning. Manages selected goal state and integrates various dashboard components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with a hero section, feature highlights, and a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides helper functions to convert backend nanosecond timestamps into JavaScript dates and formatted date strings.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Extracts readable error messages from unknown error objects with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/trackingMetrics.ts: Computes check-in and goal metrics over recent days, including completion rates and counts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and extensions for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, pending requests, and state versioning.
